General.Name: Plantable Health Inc.
General.Description: Plantable Health Inc. produces and sells plant-based meal products in the United States. It offers reboot program, which combines 12 meal boxes, one-on-one coaching, and access to the Plantable App; and Quickstart program, a one-week program that includes 12 meal boxes, an onboarding call with a plantable coach, and personalized support for up to fourteen days. The company also provides meals-only products; and à la carte box, a customized box that allows customers to choose from 12 fully prepared meals. Plantable Health Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 220-333 Terminal Avenue, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6A 4C1
